 (let [{:keys [action-fn]} (get items (:selected-item this))

 :items/potion {:name "POTION"
 :description "Heals 20 HP"
 :action-delay 2000
 :submenu? false
 :friendly? true
 :targeting-fn target-random-friendly
 :action-fn (item-action-fn-wrap (fn [target]
 (let [newhealth (min (+ 20 (:health target))
 (:maxhealth target))]
 [(assoc target :health newhealth)
 (str " healed "
 (:name target)
 " for "
 (- newhealth (:health target)))])))}
 :rage {:name "RAGE"}
 :tools {:name "TOOLS"}
 :blackmagic {:name "B.MAG"}
 :whitemagic {:name "W.MAG"}

 :fight {:name "FIGHT"
 :action-delay 2000
 :submenu? false
 :friendly? false
 :targeting-fn target-random-opponent
 :action-fn (fn [targeter target _]
 (let [newhealth (max 0
 (- (:health target)
 (:pstr targeter)))
 newstate (assoc target :health newhealth)]
 [(if (>= 0 newhealth)
 (assoc newstate :status #{:dead})
 newstate)
 (str
 (:name targeter)
 " hit "
 (:name target)
 " for "
 (- (:health target) (:health newstate))
 " damage!")]))}})", :offset 3271, :ns "domdungeon.battle.utils"} {:command "(map nil nil)", :offset 13, :ns "domdungeon.battle.subs"} {:command "(seq [1 2 3 4])", :offset 15, :ns "domdungeon.battle.views.main"} {:command "(#{1 2} 3)", :offset 10, :ns "domdungeon.battle.events"} {:command "(#{1 2} 1 3)", :offset 12, :ns "domdungeon.battle.events"} {:command "(#{1 2} 1 1)", :offset 12, :ns "domdungeon.battle.events"} {:command "(conj {:a 2} {:hi "there"})", :offset 27, :ns "domdungeon.battle.events"} {:command "(reduce (fn [coll [a b]] (conj coll {a b}))

 :rage {:name "RAGE"
 :action-delay standard-action-delay
 :friendly? false
 :targeting-fn target-random-opponent
 :action-fn (fn [targeter target this]
 (let [ragefactor 2
 newhealth (max 0
 (Math/round (- (:health target)
 (* ragefactor
 (:pstr targeter)))))
 newstate (assoc target :health newhealth)]
 [(if (>= 0 newhealth)
 (assoc newstate :status #{:dead})
 newstate)
 (wrap-battle-log-msg targeter target this
 (str (- (:health target) (:health newstate))
 " DMG"))]))}

 :tools {:name "TOOLS"}
 :blackmagic {:name "B.MAG"}
 :whitemagic {:name "W.MAG"}

 :fight {:name "FIGHT"
 :action-delay standard-action-delay
 :friendly? false
 :targeting-fn target-random-opponent
 :action-fn (fn [targeter target this]
 (let [newhealth (max 0
 (Math/round (- (:health target)
 (:pstr targeter))))
 damage (- (:health target) newhealth)
 newstate (assoc target :health newhealth)]
 [(if (>= 0 newhealth)
 (assoc newstate :status #{:dead})
 newstate)
 (wrap-battle-log-msg targeter target this
 (str damage " DMG"))]))}})", :offset 5014, :ns "domdungeon.db.skills"} {:command "(defn other-team [team]
 (if (= team :enemies) :characters :enemies))", :offset 70, :ns "domdungeon.db.skills"} {:command "(defn target-random-friendly
 "Target a random friendly."
 [targeter db]
 (let [myself (get-in db targeter)
 targeted-member (->> myself :team (get db) vals (remove #((:status %) :dead)) (map :id) rand-nth)]
 [(:team myself) targeted-member]))", :offset 256, :ns "domdungeon.db.skills"} {:command "(defn target-random-opponent
 "Target a random opponent."
 [targeter db]
 (let [myself (get-in db targeter)
 other-chars (get db (-> myself :team other-team))
 targeted-member (->> other-chars vals (remove #((:status %) :dead)) (map :id) rand-nth)]
 [(other-team (:team myself)) targeted-member]))", :offset 317, :ns "domdungeon.db.skills"} {:command "(defn wrap-target-fn
 "Wrap a skill's default targeting fn with the desired coordinates."
 [desired-coords default-fn]
 (fn [targeter db]
 (if (get-in db desired-coords)
 desired-coords
 (default-fn targeter db))))", :offset 230, :ns "domdungeon.db.skills"} {:command "(defn wrap-battle-log-msg

 ": "

 " "

 ", "
 rest))", :offset 170, :ns "domdungeon.db.skills"} {:command "(defn item-action-fn-wrap
